5.28. sections Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block sections
  ...
  !endblock

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The sections filter is used to create section jumps for html and hlp outputs: for these formats, the text of each paragraph (excluding punctuation) is assumed to be the title of a section within this document. For other outputs, the text is unchanged.

Examples


There are lots of new things in this version including:

!block sections
. Topics mode
. HTML headers and footers
!endblock

Further details are given below.
